metadata.Title: CVE-2021-43537 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An incorrect type conversion of sizes from 64bit to 32bit integers allowedan attacker to corrupt memory leading to a potentially exploitable crash.This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 91.4.0, Firefox ESR < 91.4.0, andFirefox < 95.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
